snippet.title: Slaves of Magic trailer (#fantasy #turnbased #tactical #RPG)
snippet.description:
Humanity has been invaded by otherworldly forces using magic. Can you lead the resistance against the oppressors in this #fantasy #turnbased #strategy #indiegame to save humanity from becoming slaves of magic?

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1442610/Slaves_of_Magic/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=trailer_2

Learn more on our website: https://www.indiedb.com/games/slaves-of-magic

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SlavesOfMagic

All press-related info and materials: https://www.indiedb.com/games/slaves-of-magic/presskit
